lead_paragraph: Charles Tillman, a starter for top-seeded Carolina, was injured in Sunday’s win over Tampa Bay and will miss the playoffs.
snippet: Charles Tillman, a starter for top-seeded Carolina, was injured in Sunday’s win over Tampa Bay and will miss the playoffs.

headline.main: Panthers Lose Cornerback to Knee Injury
headline.print_headline: Panthers Lose Cornerback to Knee Injury

abstract: NFL Roundup; Carolina Panthers cornerback Charles Tillman is out for the playoffs with knee injury; other football news noted.
